Skill.label: Choose anything for 6th Socket in non-mainlink
Choose anything for 6th Socket in non-mainlink
--- 4-Links that are the same in all Setups ---
If you like micromanagement and don't want curses

Skill.source: Item:18:Gloves End: The Embalmer, Carnal Mitts

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!---PASSIVE PROGRESSION TREES CAN BE SELECTED IN "TREE" SECTION FROM THE BOTTOM LEFT DROP DOWN MENU---!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Bandit: Kill All for 2 Passives
Ascendancy: In Passive Tree Progression Parts
Pantheon: Major: Lunaris in Maps, Solaris for Bosses Minor: Shakari for Toughness, Garukhan for Evasion and Movement Speed, Tukohama for cocky Facetanking
Most Important Gear when Progressing from Start to End: Ignore Socket Colors on my Gear - ALWAYS GET COLORS DEPENDING ON THE GEMS YOU WANT TO PUT IN THERE!!! - Put your 4-links wherever you can get the color setups the easiest! 1. Embalmer + Drillneck (strong overall base stats) 2. Darkscorn (huge damage, but expensive early on - if too expensive, go for Flasks and Dendrobate first) 3. Flasks (damage, defense, utility - you're Pathfinder SO GET GOOD FLASKS!!) 4. Dendrobate (5l already stronger than Tabula - huge damage if INT and DEX available) 5. Circle of Nostalgia (good damage but pricy - get it once you fixed most of your other gear) 6. Stygian Vise and Jewels 7. Drillneck Corruption "Projectilces deal 10% increased Damage for each Enemy Pierced" (a bit more damage, but not necessary - cheap close to max rolls around 1ex maybe) Also: get at least 1 roll with any Fire Damage Added (to (Bow) Attacks) from either Ring, Amulet, Jewel, Drillneck Corruption, Craft - this will activate Cinderswallow's Damage Buff Effect
Enchants (none of them is necessary but nice to have): Helm: Scourge Arrow Additional Spore Pod Gloves: Reflection Boots: Movement Speed, Regen, Attack/Cast Speed
Anointment: Early Game: Freedom of Movement for Phasing and Movement Speed Endgame: Dirty Techniques for Huge Damage Defense: Anything with Life / Life Regen / Flasks
Rare Gear: 1. Cap Resistances, get necessary Attributes (INT, STR) and a lot of Life - also Movement Speed on Boots 2. Chaos Res 3. Evasion Also: get at least 1 roll with any Fire Damage Added (to (Bow) Attacks) from either Ring, Amulet, Jewel, Drillneck Corruption, Craft - this will activate Cinderswallow's Damage Buff Effect
Jewels: Life, Poison Duration, Damage with Poison, Chaos DoT Multi, Damage over Time, Phys/Chaos to (Bow) Attacks, Attack Speed If Phasing not from Flask or Anoint anymore - get it on Abyss Jewel Also: get at least 1 roll with any Fire Damage Added (to (Bow) Attacks) from either Ring, Amulet, Jewel, Drillneck Corruption, Craft - this will activate Cinderswallow's Damage Buff Effect If Cluster Jewels are not a thing anymore - get Avatar of the Hunt instead
Cluster Jewel Notables - Number is approx Damage % improve 5% Chaos Damage over Time Multi - 2,6 Brewed for Potency - 3 (Flask Charges) Flow of Life - 3 (Life/Life Regen) Wicked Pall - 4,4 (Skill Effect Duration) Student of Decay - 3 (Chaos Res) Steady Torment - 5,3 (if also bleeding - MEGA OP DAMAGE 10,7) Exposure Therapy/Brush with Death - 5,2 Circling Oblivion - 7,9 Unwaveringly Evil - 3,8 If Cluster Jewels are not a thing anymore - get Avatar of the Hunt instead
Leveling at League Start: (G-green socket, R-red socket, B-blue socket --- also, if no lvl given behind support gem it means this support is below the active skill lvl requirement) 1-11 Split Arrow 4 Link (4G or 3G 1R - 1 B in here works, but is bad) Onslaught (lvl 1) Pierce (lvl 1) and then Volley (lvl 4) Mirage Archer (lvl 4) or Maim (lvl 8) (only if red socket - otherwise Mirage Archer much better) - Increased Critical Strikes (lvl 8) is only useful blue support early on
12-27 Rain of Arrows 4 Link (4G or 3G 1R - 1 B in here works, but is bad) Onslaught Mirage Archer Added Cold Damage, later Vicious Projectiles (lvl 18) OR Maim (only if red socket - otherwise Added Cold/Vicious better) - Increased Critical Strikes (lvl 8) is only useful blue support early on
28+ G Scourge Arrow 4 to 6 link (gems are sorted by importance - chose whatever early 3-6l colors and attributes (need int) you get early on) G Lesser Poison into Poison (lvl 31) G Mirage Archer B Infused Channelling (lvl 4 from different class or after Act 3 Library Quest) - Need a lot of INT! G Deadly Ailments or Lesser Poison if Bow is extremely bad! (low physical/chaos damage) - Need some INT! B Unbound Ailments (lvl 8 from different class or after Act 3 Library Quest) or Added Chaos Damage (lvl 31 Act 3 Library Quest) if Bow is extremely bad! (low physical/chaos damage) - Need INT! G Vile Toxins (lvl 38 - swap in for Mirage against Bosses) Sadly, Onslaught only works if your hits kill enemies - not the DoT Best 4 Link 4G: Poison, Mirage, Deadly / Lesser Poison (depending on Bow) Best 4 Link 3G 1B: Poison, Mirage, Infused / Unbound / Added Chaos (depending on Bow and INT) Best 5 Link 4G 1B: Poison, Mirage, Deadly / Lesser Poison (depending on Bow), Infused / Unbound / Added Chaos (depending on Bow and INT) Best 5 Link 3G 2B: Poison, Mirage, 2 of Infused / Unbound / Added Chaos (depending on Bow and INT) Best 6 Link 4G 2B: Poison, Mirage, Deadly / Lesser Poison (depending on Bow), 2 of Infused / Unbound / Added Chaos (depending on Bow and INT)
